price: Kuma kada ka kõri waɗanda* suke kiran Ubangijinsu sãfe da maraice, sunã nufin yardarSa, babu wani abu daga hisãbinsu a kanka, kuma babu wani abu daga hisãbinka a kansu, har ka kõre su ka kasance daga azzãlumai.
arabic: وَلَا تَطۡرُدِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلۡعَشِيِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَهُۥۖ مَا عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ وَمَا مِنۡ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَتَطۡرُدَهُمۡ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Musulunci addinin Allah ne, wanda yake faƙĩrin dũkiya da mawãdãcinta, duka ɗaya suke a gare shi. Sabõda haka wanda duka ya rigayi wani a cikinsu, to, bã za a kõre shi ba dõmin ɗayan ya shiga. Allah ĩmãni Yake so, kõ daga wãne irin mutum yake, bã Ya bukãtar dũkiya.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā taṭrudi alladhīna yadʿūna rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-ʿashiyi yurīdūna wajhahu mā ʿalayka min ḥisābihim min shayin wamā min ḥisābika ʿalayhim min shayin fataṭrudahum fatakūna mina al-ẓālimīna
translations: So were you to send them away
